body:
I know this isn't Avicus related, so a staff member can archive/lock this if they want.

I've been running a server for a while, it's going pretty good and I have nice staff, but, I've been having problems.

IDK anything about plugins and coding.

I need someone that can do stuff like: 

-Portals from the hub to Factions/KitPvP/Mini-Game worlds

Disabling PvP, blocking placing, etc. in certain worlds and certain places.

-Permissions. Right now the lowest staff rank, Helper, which we want to just have /kick, has the same permissions as owner.

Thanks for reading!

-Zach
body_tagged:

title: Need a server developer!

replies.body: Well, i know how Disable PvP, block placing, block destroying, damage and that stuff for certain worlds and places. I got a plugin for Permissions really cool that i can modify to improve it.
replies.body_tagged: Well, i know how Disable PvP, block placing, block destroying, damage and that stuff for certain worlds and places. I got a plugin for Permissions really cool that i can modify to improve it.

replies.body:
The more you try to do on your own, the more you learn.
The things you listed are rather easy to configure.
If you don't find anyone, try getting some help from google and so on, pretty sure it wouldn't take too much time ;)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I have a friend who is a super genius in computers and java. Add me on Skype and i'll point you in his direction. Skype: Jacob.sandobal
replies.body_tagged: I have a friend who is a super genius in computers and java. Add me on Skype and i'll point you in his direction. Skype: Jacob.sandobal

replies.body: I would recommend World Guard for those worlds you want protected but as for the others, all those plugins so just visit http://www.bukkit.org/, check out the plugins and download the plugins you want. Good luck!
replies.body_tagged: I would recommend World Guard for those worlds you want protected but as for the others, all those plugins so just visit http://www.bukkit.org/, check out the plugins and download the plugins you want. Good luck!

replies.body: I have a lot of experience with bukkit developing as well as client side modifications. I can help you with your server if you need. Do you need a portfolio?
replies.body_tagged: I have a lot of experience with bukkit developing as well as client side modifications. I can help you with your server if you need. Do you need a portfolio?

replies.body: A lot of Bukkit plugins aren't customisable. I would recommend learning how to program, it'll be so much easier in the long run...
replies.body_tagged: A lot of Bukkit plugins aren't customisable. I would recommend learning how to program, it'll be so much easier in the long run...

replies.body: All these plugins have already been made, and can be found on bukkit.
replies.body_tagged: All these plugins have already been made, and can be found on bukkit.

replies.body: We know, we have most of them. It's just that none of us know how to/understand how to use them, and we don't have enough time to figure this out.

replies.body:
@fishisea:
The more you learn - The more you know
The more you know - The more you forget
The more you forget - The less you know
The less you know - The less you forget
The less you forget - The more you know
So why dafuq he need to learn himself :P
